Package com.google.inject.tools.suite.code

The code package is the objects for running code snippets in userspace.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
CodeRunner The CodeRunner runs CodeSnippet objects in a separate virtual machine that also has access to the user's class files.
CodeRunner.CodeRunListener Interface that listeners for the CodeRunner must implement.
CodeRunnerFactory Factory for creating code runners by passing in java managers.
 

Class Summary
CodeRunner.Runnable A Runnable is something the CodeRunner can run.
CodeRunnerModule A module binding code runner implementations.
 

Exception Summary
CodeRunner.NotCodeSnippetException An exception thrown if the CodeRunner is asked to run a non CodeSnippet object.
CodeRunner.NotCodeSnippetResultException An exception thrown if the CodeRunner received notification of a result that is not the result of a CodeSnippet.
 

Package com.google.inject.tools.suite.code Description

The code package is the objects for running code snippets in userspace.

The CodeRunner is the main object, these are injected where needed to run code snippets (see the com.google.inject.tools.suite.snippets package).

Author:
Darren Creutz (dcreutz@gmail.com)
